title: 25-26 season opening
description:
We're excited to announce that we will organize a 25-26 ski season Opening Event at November 1st 2025 at ski resort Pitztal Gletscher, Austria.
 
Come and join the raffles！Generous gifts are waiting for you!

title: N47 Snowboard Park Camp
description: Join our freestyle training camp designed for all skill levels. Learn park basics, improve your tricks, and ride with our experienced coaches in a fun and friendly environment. Whether you're hitting your first rail or dialing in your spins, this camp is your next step in freestyle progression.

title: Christmas Ski Carnival
description: Celebrate Christmas in the Dolomites with a week of skiing and snowboarding. Enjoy exclusive gifts and unforgettable memories.

title: Nitro & N47 European Chinese Snowboard Park Challenge (Men & Women)
description: The competition is scheduled to take place in ski resort Mayrhofen, Austria in February. Generous prizes sponsored by Nitro will be awarded to the participants.

title: Nitro 26-27 New Snowboard Test Event
description: Be the first to ride Nitro’s brand-new 26-27 snowboard lineup — for free! Join us this March for an exclusive on-snow test event, open to all riders. Try out the latest shapes, tech, and designs before anyone else.
